VA CLD OBS AT 1950Z SFC/FL210 WI S0200 W07820 - S0208 W07914
- S0208 W07943 - S0201 W08004 - S0200 W07820 MOV W 25-30KT

SYR-MSS-30SSE YSC-50E YSC-60NW PQI 
WST ISSUANCES POSS. REFER TO MOST RECENT ACUS01 KWNS FROM STORM 
PREDICTION CENTER FOR SYNOPSIS AND METEOROLOGICAL DETAILS.
